original_text: And they shall go into the holes of the rocks, and into the caves of the earth, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty, when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.
korean_text: 사람들이 암혈과 토굴로 들어가서 여호와께서 땅을 진동시키려고 일어나실 때에 그의 위엄과 그 광대하심의 영광을 피할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And they shall go into holes of rocks
and into caves of the earth
and for the glory of his majesty
when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅을 심히 흔들려고 일어날 때에
